remarks: Banach fixed point theorem, also known as contraction mapping theorem. A contraction on a complete metric space has a unique fixed point.  We show existence in the lemmas, and uniqueness here - if ` F ` has two fixed points, then the distance between them is less than ` K ` times itself, a contradiction.
